sqlMap.statement: SELECT GRP.MENU_PROC_GRP_CD AS MENU_PROC_GRP_CD ,GRP.MENU_PROC_GRP_NM AS MENU_PROC_GRP_NM ,GRP.MENU_PROC_GRP_SORT_NUM AS MENU_PROC_GRP_SORT_NUM ,GRP.MENU_PROC_GRP_DESC_TXT AS MENU_PROC_GRP_DESC_TXT ,GRP.WF_APP_NM AS WF_APP_NM ,GRP.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME ,GRP.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE FROM MENU_PROC_GRP GRP WHERE GRP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND GRP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY GRP.MENU_PROC_GRP_SORT_NUM ,GRP.MENU_PROC_GRP_CD
SELECT MAX(GRP.MENU_PROC_GRP_CD) AS MENU_PROC_GRP_CD FROM MENU_PROC_GRP GRP WHERE GRP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD#

SELECT PRC.MENU_PROC_ID AS MENU_PROC_ID ,PRC.MENU_PROC_NM AS MENU_PROC_NM ,PRC.OTH_SYS_FLG AS OTH_SYS_FLG ,PRC.OTH_SYS_URL AS OTH_SYS_URL ,PRC.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME ,PRC.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE FROM MENU_PROC_RELN REL ,MENU_PROC PRC WHERE REL.GLBL_CMPY_CD_G0 = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND REL.MENU_PROC_GRP_CD = #MENU_PROC_GRP_CD# AND REL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PRC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = REL.GLBL_CMPY_CD_P0 AND PRC.MENU_PROC_ID = REL.MENU_PROC_ID AND PRC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY REL.MENU_PROC_ID
SELECT MAX(MENU_PROC_ID) AS MENU_PROC_ID FROM MENU_PROC_RELN WHERE MENU_PROC_GRP_CD = #MENU_PROC_GRP_CD# AND GLBL_CMPY_CD_G0 = #GLBL_CMPY_CD#

SELECT TAB.UP_TAB_CD AS UP_TAB_CD ,TAB.UP_TAB_NM AS UP_TAB_NM ,REL.UP_TAB_SORT_NUM AS UP_TAB_SORT_NUM ,TAB.BIZ_APP_ID AS BIZ_APP_ID ,TAB.BIZ_APP_NM AS BIZ_APP_NM ,TAB.MY_PROC_USBLE_FLG AS MY_PROC_USBLE_FLG ,REL.UP_TAB_USBLE_FLG AS UP_TAB_USBLE_FLG ,TAB.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME ,TAB.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE FROM UP_TAB_RELN REL ,UP_TAB TAB WHERE REL.GLBL_CMPY_CD_P0 = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND REL.MENU_PROC_ID = #MENU_PROC_ID# AND REL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TAB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = REL.GLBL_CMPY_CD_T0 AND TAB.UP_TAB_CD = REL.UP_TAB_CD AND TAB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY REL.UP_TAB_SORT_NUM ,REL.UP_TAB_CD
SELECT MAX(TAB.UP_TAB_CD) AS UP_TAB_CD FROM UP_TAB TAB WHERE TAB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD#
